query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `event_rsvps` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `eventId` int NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','confirmed','cancelled','attended','no_show') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `qrCode` varchar(64),
  `plusOneName` varchar(128),
  `plusOneCheckedIn` boolean NOT NULL DEFAULT false,
  `checkedInAt` timestamp,
  `checkedInById` int,
  `notes` text,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `event_rsvps_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`),
  CONSTRAINT `event_rsvps_qrCode_unique` UNIQUE(`qrCode`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `reputation_events` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `userId` int NOT NULL,
  `eventType` enum('first_mark','additional_mark','event_attendance','referral_joined','referral_marked','early_adopter','inner_circle','admin_bonus','admin_penalty') NOT NULL,
  `points` int NOT NULL,
  `referenceId` int,
  `referenceType` varchar(64),
  `description` varchar(255),
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `reputation_events_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `referrals` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `referrerId` int NOT NULL,
  `referredUserId` int,
  `referralCode` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','joined','marked','expired') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `joinedAt` timestamp,
  `markedAt` timestamp,
  `referrerPointsAwarded` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `expiresAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `referrals_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `reputation_events` (

  CONSTRAINT `reputation_events_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `referrals` (
  `id` int AUTO_INCREMENT NOT NULL,
  `referrerId` int NOT NULL,
  `referredUserId` int,
  `referralCode` varchar(32) NOT NULL,
  `status` enum('pending','joined','marked','expired') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pending',
  `joinedAt` timestamp,
  `markedAt` timestamp,
  `referrerPointsAwarded` int NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
  `expiresAt` timestamp NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updatedAt` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT `referrals_id` PRIMARY KEY(`id`)
);
